Texts.Chs: 把^orange;污染水^reset;带给这名科学家。 (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Contaminated Water^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我不知道该如何为我的化学原料制造一些^orange;污染水^reset;，你能帮我在^green;离心机^reset;中制造一些吗？
Texts.Eng: I just can't figure out how to make the ^orange;Contaminated Water^reset; for some of my chemical stock. Can you help and make me some in a ^green;centrifuge^reset;?

Texts.Chs: 如果你能做到，就把离心机^green;升级到高级离心机^reset;，加强你的实验游戏吧！务必保留一些^orange;污染水^reset;，你可能会需要它。
Texts.Eng: When you are able to, ^green;upgrade to an advanced centrifuge^reset; to really step up your lab game! Oh and be sure to keep your ^orange;Contaminated Water^reset;, you might need it.
